name: Run The Ponds
description: Social running for all faces & paces. Thursdays 5+8K groups from The All Inn, additional runs on Saturdays - please check Instagram and join the WhatsApp group linked there for more information.

time.details: 5+8K groups from The All Inn. Just turn up or join on WhatsApp, see latest link on Instagram bio.

location.address: The All Inn, 106 North St, Bedminster, BS3 1EN
